# 4 – Unit, Integration & Property Testing   <!-- Issue #4 -->

**Goal:** Deliver a robust test suite covering functional behaviour and edge cases.

## Tasks
- [ ] Audit existing tests in `/Tests/`
- [ ] Add property-based tests for pipeline laws (associativity, identity)
- [ ] Create integration tests for vector stores & LLM providers
- [ ] Configure test matrix (.NET 8, .NET 9-preview)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Coverage ≥ 90 %
- CI test run < 5 minutes
- Zero flaky tests across 10 consecutive runs

_Part of #1_
